name: Jack-O-Lantern Covers of Darkness
description:
The crazy Jack-O-Lanterns have emerged from the underworld and are taking over the world. The pumpkins over their heads gives them super pumpkin powers and above average intelligence.

You have come to stop them and the Elite Pumpkin Wizards are willing to help you take them down. Find the seven pumpkin wizards and collect their keys to put a stop to this madness.

Move through the maze and see how far can you get.

The player starts in the middle of the maze and using the game map tries to find the pumpkin lords and keys. The player has the ability to shoot fireballs and move in stealth mode to attack and avoid detection. If you are caught you will have to pay a price by fighting 3 pumpkin lords.
